divs: Sighting DetailsToday just few hours ago I record on my video camera type Panasonic for 0.12.47 minutes a very wonderfull object,in a lower altitude. Location of recording balcony in the first floor ,location of UFO was between two high buildings exactley between the third floor of the two buildings.UFO was heading to Giza Pyramids (as usual),but takes lower and lower altitude till hides behind the two buildings.It was taking different amazing shapes ,as stated upove. I wish to send you this urgent report ,before I will add on my web site togther with the other cases ,from may 25 2007 and during june 2007 (around ten cases). For your kind information last updating of my web site was 01st Jun 2007. but the other cases are not included yet. NB.The weather and the sky was very very fair and clear.
Summary: Hello again....this is Dr.Ibrahim again sendeng this short report from Cairo.Egypt....-As soon as I just finished updating my web site:www.ufo-egyptian-hunter.org-and added the fresh UFO footages in our area-And still having around ten cases not been yet
Object Shape: Cigar, Cone, Cross, Cylinder, Disc, Egg, Fireball, Flash, Oval, Sphere, Star-like, Other, Unknown
